titleStmt.title: Christian moderation In two books. By Jos: Exon.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Miles Flesher [and R. Oulton?], and are to be sold by Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: The second book begins on *Aar with new pagination.
The title page is conjugate; chain lines are approximately 20mm apart. Variant: title page is a cancel, but same setting as above, with chain lines approximately 25mm apart; rest of quire as above.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
